course.subject: CENG
course.name: Polymer Fundamentals and Advanced Applications
course.description: Polymer, one of the most fascinating inventions in synthetic chemistry, has drown great attention in the areas of materials science, nano technology, bio- and life science, IT and communication, etc. This course will introduce fundamental concepts of polymer science from the general physical properties to the basic synthetic chemistry of polymerisation. Applications of polymers in the field of materials in engineering and daily life, in chemical engineering separation, in drug delivery, and in design and nanotechnology will be discussed.
